data.description: Provides a simplified interface to the DBI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DBI::Simple is designed to make the DBI more convenient. It
    features a simplified connection string, easier reading and
    assigning of columns, and the ability to move through a recordset
    one record at a time.

    DBI::Simple should be included in the DBI namespace because it's
    really just an extension of the DBI.
